text: Maciej Parowski (27 December 1946 - 2 June 2019) was a Polish journalist, essayist, science fiction writer, editor and translator. She was born in Warsaw. He worked as a critic of science-fiction. He was Chief editor of Nowa Fantastyka from 1992 to 2003. He also wrote the comics: Funky Koval and Wiedźmin. Parowski died on 2 June 2019 in Warsaw at the age of 72.Nie żyje Maciej Parowski, pisarz i twórca "Nowej Fantastyki" ==References== ==Other websites== * Fantastyka pisarze: Maciej Parowski - o autorze Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Polish journalists Category:Polish essayists Category:Editors Category:Polish translators Category:Writers from Warsaw
title: Maciej Parowski
